-- Define abstract VehicleComponent type
model VehicleModel

abstract class VehicleComponent {
    - name: String;
}

-- Define Vehicle type
class Vehicle {
    -- Define attributes
    - numberOfWheels: Integer = 4;
    - engine: Engine;
    - transmission: Transmission;

    -- Define relationships
    -- A vehicle has exactly one engine and one transmission
    -- A vehicle has exactly four wheels
    -- A vehicle can have multiple instances of each wheel type
    -- A vehicle can have multiple instances of each component type
    -- A vehicle can have extensions of vehicle and component types
    -- A vehicle can have extensions of wheel and component types

    -- Define composition relationships
    -- A vehicle is composed of one engine and one transmission
    -- A vehicle is composed of four wheels
    -- A vehicle can be composed of multiple instances of each component type
    -- A vehicle can be composed of multiple instances of each wheel type
    -- A vehicle can be extended by multiple instances of vehicle and component types
    -- A vehicle can be extended by multiple instances of wheel and component types

    --

model FuelManagementSystem

context Context
create
    FuelManagementSystem as System

-- Define the Components
package FuelManagementSystem_Components

create
    FuelTankAssembly(name="Fuel Tank Assembly") as Block,
    Engine(name="Engine") as Block
endPackage FuelManagementSystem_Components

-- Define the Interfaces
package FuelManagementSystem_Interfaces

create
    FuelSupplyInterface(name="Fuel Supply Interface") as Interface,
    FuelReturnInterface(name="Fuel Return Interface") as Interface,
    TemperatureInterface(name="Temperature Interface") as Interface
endPackage FuelManagementSystem_Interfaces

-- Define the Connections
package FuelManagementSystem_Connections

create
    FuelSupplyConnection(source=FuelTankAssembly.FuelSupplyPort, target=Engine.FuelSupplyPort, interface=FuelSupplyInterface),
    FuelReturnConnection(source=Engine.FuelReturnPort

-- Define the system context
model PowertrainSystem

Block FuelCommand
Block Transmission
Block Wheel

  source : Engine,
  target : FuelCommand,

  target : Engine,

  target : Transmission,
  navigated_by : has_Transmission
]

Relation Transmission_transmits_EngineTorque [
  source : Transmission,
  target : Engine,

]

]

-- Define the system
model PowerConnectionSystem

-- Define the context
context Context

-- Define the blocks
block Vehicle
    extends Context
    provides PowerConnection

block Trailer
    extends Context
    requires PowerConnection

block HitchBall
    extends MechanicalComponent
    ownedBy Vehicle

block TrailerCoupler
    extends MechanicalComponent
    ownedBy Trailer

-- Define the interfaces
interface PowerConnection
    operation Connect()
    operation Disconnect()

-- Define the relationships
relationship Connection
    source HitchBall
    target TrailerCoupler
    end

relationship Requirement
    source Vehicle
    target PowerConnection

relationship Requirement
    source Trailer
    target PowerConnection

-- Define the main system
model AutomotiveSystem

-- Define the automobile as the main system
System Automobile

-- Define the configurable components
Block SubsystemA
    Property configOption1 : Boolean = true
    Property configOption2 : Boolean = false
    Subsystem
        Part Component1
        Part Component2
        Part Component3

Block SubsystemB
    Property configOption1 : Boolean = true
    Property configOption2 : Boolean = false
    Property configOption3 : Boolean = false
    Subsystem
        Part Component4
        Part Component5
        Part Component6

-- Define the relationships between components
SubsystemA --|> Subsystem
SubsystemB --|> Subsystem

-- Define the constraints
Constraint constraint1
    for SubsystemA.configOption2
    then SubsystemB.configOption3 = true
    or SubsystemA.configOption2 = false

-- Define the predefined configurations
Configuration ConfigurationA
    SubsystemA.configOption1 = true
    SubsystemA.configOption2 = false
    SubsystemB.configOption1 = true

    that The system supports the definition of quality analysis requirements

requirement VehicleQualityAnalysisSystem_Req_005
    provided by VehicleQualityAnalysisSystem
    that The

-- Define the System
model FuelSupplySystem

-- Define the Context
context Context
  create FuelSupplySystem : System
endContext Context

-- Define the FuelTankAssembly Block
block FuelTankAssembly
  extends Context

  -- Define the FuelTank
  part FuelTank : Tank

  -- Define the FuelPump
  part FuelPump : Valve
    self.name = 'FuelPump'
    self.isControl = true

  -- Define the FuelTankAssembly Interfaces
  interface FuelSupplyInterface
    provide Fuel : Flow
    provide FuelReturn : Flow
    provide FuelTemperature : Real

  interface FuelConsumingUnitInterface
    require Fuel : Flow

  -- Connect the FuelTankAssembly Interfaces
  FuelTankAssembly -> FuelSupplyInterface
  FuelTankAssembly -> FuelConsumingUnitInterface

  -- Define the FuelTankAssembly Connections
  FuelTankAssembly.FuelTank -> FuelTankAssembly

-- Define the System
model BloodGlucoseMeter

-- Define the Blocks
Block Battery
Block BatteryManagement
Block BloodGlucoseSensor
Block Alarm
Block EmergencyResponse

-- Define the Relationships
Battery -->> BatteryManagement : Provides
BatteryManagement -->> Alarm : Triggers
BatteryManagement -->> EmergencyResponse : Triggers

-- Define the Properties
Property Battery.capacity : real = 1000.0
Property Battery.status : Boolean = true

-- Define the Operations
Operation BatteryManagement.checkBatteryStatus() : Boolean
Operation BatteryManagement.alertUser() : void
Operation Alarm.activate() : void
Operation EmergencyResponse.respond() : void

-- Define the Block Diagram
BlockDiagram BatterySystem
BatterySystem.Battery : Battery
BatterySystem.BatteryManagement : BatteryManagement
BatterySystem.BloodGlucoseSensor : BloodGlucoseSensor
BatterySystem.Alarm : Alarm
BatterySystem.EmergencyResponse : EmergencyResponse

BatterySystem

-- Define the system
model Headlamp_Adjustment_System

-- Define the context
context Context
  requires SI
endContext Context

-- Define the blocks
block Headlamp
  provides Light
endblock Headlamp

block Headlamp_Adjustment_Knob
  extends Block
  requires SI

  property tiltAngle : real
endblock Headlamp_Adjustment_Knob

-- Define the constraints
constraint Tilt_Angle_Constraint
  for (headlamp : Headlamp, knob : Headlamp_Adjustment_Knob)
  where (50_degrees <= knob.tiltAngle <= 80_degrees)
endconstraint Tilt_Angle_Constraint

-- Define the System
model BatteryChargingControlSystem

-- Define the Context
context Context

-- Define the Blocks
Block Battery
Block Charger
Block BatteryManagementSystem

-- Define the Relationships
Battery -->> Charger : supplies
Charger -->> BatteryManagementSystem : reports
BatteryManagementSystem -->> Battery : monitors
BatteryManagementSystem -->> Charger : controls

-- Define the Battery
Block Battery
    property float BatteryLevel

-- Define the Charger
Block Charger
    property float ChargingCurrent

-- Define the BatteryManagementSystem
Block BatteryManagementSystem
    operation RealTimeBatteryLevelMonitoring()
    operation AutomaticCharging()
    operation ChargingTerminationControl()

-- Define the Constraints
constraint ChargingTermination
    if BatteryManagementSystem.BatteryLevel >= 100 then
        Charger.ChargingCurrent = 0
    end if

-- Define the Flow
Flow BatteryLevelFlow
    source BatteryManagementSystem

-- Define the system
model ChargingSystem

-- Define the context
context Context

-- Define the blocks
Block Battery
Block Charger
Block ControlSystem

-- Define the relationships
Battery --realization-> ControlSystem : BatteryManagement
Charger --realization-> ControlSystem : ChargingControl

-- Define the properties
Property BatteryLevelPercentage
    type Double
    initial 0.0
    final 100.0
    isReadOnly false

Block Battery
    BatteryLevelPercentage : self.level

-- Define the behavior
Behavior ChargingBehavior
    initialNode InitialNode

    InitialNode --> Node1
    Node1 [event ChargingStarted]
    Node1 --> Node2

    Node2 [invariant BatteryBelow100]
    Node2 --> Node3

    Node3 [action ReplenishBattery]
    Node3 --> Node4

    Node4 [invariant BatteryAt100]
    Node4 --> Node5

    Node5 [action ChargingTerminated

-- Define the main system
model CameraSystem

-- Define the context
context Context
    create ObjectNode contextRoot

-- Define the main system
package CameraSystem
    extend Context

    -- Define the autofocus subsystem
    subsystem AutofocusSubsystem
        create ObjectNode autofocusNode
        provide Focusing
    endSubsystem AutofocusSubsystem

    -- Define the imaging subsystem

        create ObjectNode imagingNode
        provide Imaging
    endSubsystem ImagingSubsystem

    -- Define the user interface
    subsystem UserInterface
        create ObjectNode uiNode
        provide UserInterfaceControl
    endSubsystem UserInterface

-- Define the interfaces
interface Focusing
    operation ObtainFocus(scene: Scene)
endInterface Focusing

interface Imaging
    operation CaptureImage(focusedScene: Scene)
endInterface Imaging

interface UserInterfaceControl
    operation SelectScene(scene: Scene)
    operation ConfirmScene()
endInterface UserInterfaceControl

-- Define Signals
signal VehicleStartSignal
signal VehiclePowerOnSignal
signal VehicleShutdownSignal

-- Define Blocks
Block Vehicle
Block System

-- Define Internal Blocks of Vehicle
Block OffState
Block StartingState
Block OnState

-- Define Relationships
Relation Vehicle_has_OffState
Relation Vehicle_has_StartingState
Relation Vehicle_has_OnState

Vehicle -> OffState [Vehicle_has_OffState]
Vehicle -> StartingState [Vehicle_has_StartingState]
Vehicle -> OnState [Vehicle_has_OnState]

-- Define Transitions
Transition OffState_to_StartingState
Transition StartingState_to_OnState
Transition OnState_to_OffState

OffState_to_StartingState [VehicleStartSignal]
StartingState_to_OnState [VehiclePowerOnSignal]
OnState_to_OffState [VehicleShutdownSignal]

-- Define the system
model AutomaticVehicleControlSystem

-- Define the context
context AutomaticVehicleControlSystemContext

-- Define the vehicle
class Vehicle
    property status : String = "off"
endclass

-- Define the signals
signal VehicleStartSignal
signal VehicleOnSignal
signal VehicleOffSignal

-- Define the states
class State
endclass

class OffState extends State
endclass

class StartingState extends State
endclass

class OnState extends State
endclass

-- Define the transitions
transition VehicleStartTransition
    source OffState
    target StartingState
    trigger VehicleStartSignal
endtransition

transition VehicleOnTransition
    source StartingState
    target OnState
    trigger VehicleOnSignal
endtransition

transition VehicleOffTransition
    source OnState
    target OffState
    trigger VehicleOffSignal
endtransition

-- Define the system context
context SystemContext

-- Define the system
class System
    property vehicle : Vehicle
    property currentState : State = OffState
endclass

Trigger

-- Define the system context
model VehicleControlSystem

-- Define the system
package VehicleControlSystem_System
extends Block

-- Define the context
context VehicleControlSystem_Context

-- Define the off state
class OffState
extends State

-- Define the start-up state
class StartUpState
extends State

-- Define the started state
class StartedState
extends State

-- Define the off state machine
StateMachine VehicleControlSystem_StateMachine
extends ControlFlow

-- Define the states
initial OffState_State
final State OffState
State StartUpState_State
State StartedState_State

-- Define the transitions
Transition OffState_To_StartUpState
source OffState
target StartUpState
trigger VehicleStartSignal

Transition StartUpState_To_StartedState
source StartUpState
target StartedState
trigger BrakePedalDepressed_and_VehicleOnSignalReceived

Transition StartedState_To_OffState
source StartedState
target OffState
trigger ShutdownSignal

package Vehicle

class Chassis
    property mass: Real(isSpecification=false, name="Mass")

end

    property mass: Real(isSpecification=false, name="Mass")
end

-- Define the vehicle as a composite structure
structure Vehicle {
    Chassis chassis : Chassis
    Engine engine : Engine
    Gearbox gearbox : Gearbox
}

-- Define the mass calculation operation
operation calculateTotalMass(self: Vehicle) : Real
    create
        result: Real
        totalMass: Real
    end

    totalMass = self.chassis.mass +

-- Define the System
model TransportationSystem

-- Define the Context
context Context
    create OverlandTransportationInfrastructure as Class
endContext Context

-- Define the System Packages
package Requirements
    extend Context
endPackage Requirements

package SystemComponents
    extend Context
endPackage SystemComponents

package FunctionalRequirements
    extend Requirements

    create Vehicle as Class
        create Driver as Role
        create Passenger as Role
        create Seat as Part
        create Door as Part
        create Engine as Part
        create SafetySystem as Part
        create ComfortSystem as Part
        create EnvironmentalIntegrationSystem as Part
        create InfrastructureCompatibilitySystem as Part

        create Enter as Action
            create Preconditions: Vehicle.Driver -> true
            create Postconditions: Vehicle.Driver -> true
            create Preconditions: Vehicle.Passenger -> Vehicle.Door.isOpen
            create Postconditions: Vehicle.Passenger -> Vehicle.Seat.isAvailable

        create Exit as Action
            create Preconditions: Vehicle.Driver -> true

-- Define the System
model TransportationSystem

-- Define the Context
context Context

-- Define the Blocks

block Vehicle
    extends Context

    -- Define the Ports
    port EntryPort
        type Self
        required

    port ExitPort
        type Self
        required

    port DriverPort
        type Driver
        required

    port PassengerPort1..4
        type Passenger
        multiplicity (1..4)
        required

    -- Define the Internal Blocks
    internal block Engine

    internal block FuelTank
        multiplicity (1)

    -- Define the Relationships
    relationship Drives
        source Vehicle
        target Driver

    relationship Contains
        source Vehicle
        target Engine

    relationship Contains
        source Vehicle
        target FuelTank
endblock Vehicle

-- Define the Actors

actor Driver

actor Passenger

-- Define the Interactions

interaction EnterVehicle
    participants Driver, Passenger, Vehicle
    preconditions Driver -> Vehicle:

-- Define the system
model EquipmentMonitoringSystem

-- Define the context
context Context
create
    Battery: Block "Battery"
    Equipment: Block "Equipment"
    System: Block "EquipmentMonitoringSystem"
endContext Context

-- Define the relationships
Equipment -- "has" --> Battery
System -- "consistsOf" --> Equipment

-- Define the properties
property BatteryLevel_min: real "Minimum Battery Level"
property BatteryAging_probability: real "Probability of Battery Aging"
property SeverityLevel: real "Severity Level"

-- Define the blocks
Block Equipment {
    property State: String "State"
}

Block Battery {
    property Level: real "Battery Level"
}

-- Define the behavior
Behavior EquipmentBehavior {
    operation detectLowBatteryLevel() {
        if (Battery.Level < BatteryLevel_min) then {
            Equipment.State = "low battery"
            analyzeSituation()
        }
    }

    operation analyzeSitu
